exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelIconSkin" width="77" height="77" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="up,down,disabled" >
	<e:Image source="gs_select_1_png" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" includeIn="up,down"/>
	<e:Image verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="gs_select_dis_png" includeIn="disabled"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_level" text="100" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="WordSkin" width="80" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15cd311911f" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xffffff" strokeColor="0x0276d0" strokeWeight="4" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_text" text="字" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimSun" size="48" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSettingSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15cd3decc04" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.6" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="MoneyBG_png" scale9Grid="17,8,196,51" width="400" height="255" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_agree" label="" horizontalCenter="0" y="623" locked="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="YesBtn_jpg" source.down="YesBtn1_jpg"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group x="234" y="522">
		<e:Button id="btn_music" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_music_png" source.down="btn_music_down_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image id="img_music_disable" x="6" y="2" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group x="399" y="522">
		<e:Button id="btn_sound" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_sound_png" source.down="btn_sound_down_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image id="img_sound_disable" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false" y="2" x="6"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="设置" y="466" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneGameSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:components="components.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="GameBG3_jpg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image y="154.05" source="WordFrame_png" fillMode="scale" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="img_question" y="210" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="" width="390" height="260"/>
	<e:Group id="group_anwer" y="500" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true">
		<components:AnswerWord x="11" y="3" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:AnswerWord x="90.23" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:AnswerWord x="164.25" y="3" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:AnswerWord x="253.18" y="4.62" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="15" horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="0"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_words" y="650.54" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<components:Word x="24" y="37.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="34" y="47.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="44" y="57.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="54" y="67.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="64" y="77.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="74" y="87.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="84" y="97.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="94" y="107.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="104" y="117.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="114" y="127.24000000000001" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="124" y="137.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="134" y="147.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="144" y="157.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="154" y="167.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="164" y="177.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="174" y="187.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="184" y="197.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="194" y="207.24" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="255" y="261" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<components:Word x="265" y="271" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout verticalGap="20" orientation="columns" requestedColumnCount="5" horizontalGap="20" paddingTop="0" paddingLeft="0"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_win" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false" locked="true">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.53"/>
		<e:Image source="Result_png" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="550.67" anchorOffsetY="0" height="413" verticalCenter="250"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_next" label="" y="928.34" anchorOffsetX="0" width="125.51" anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" horizontalCenter="130">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ResultBtn_png" source.down="ResultBtn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="lb_from" text="标签" y="705.16" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimSun" anchorOffsetX="0" width="65%" anchorOffsetY="0" height="63.68" verticalAlign="top" multiline="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_explain" text="标签" y="800.35" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimSun" multiline="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="65%" anchorOffsetY="0" height="122.67" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" left="20" top="8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_setting" label="设置" anchorOffsetX="0" width="105" right="20" top="10">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MoneyBG_png" scale9Grid="28,8,175,51"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="36"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneLevelsSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15cd0328f93" ></w:Config>
	<e:Scroller top="0" bottom="0" scrollPolicyH="off" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Group id="group_levels">
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" right="20" bottom="20">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_setting" label="设置" anchorOffsetX="0" width="105" right="20" top="10">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MoneyBG_png" scale9Grid="28,8,175,51"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="36"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ScreenBeginSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15cd01972f0" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="GameBG1_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_begin" label="" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="20">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="StartBtn_png" source.down="StartBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_setting" label="设置" anchorOffsetX="0" width="105" right="20" top="10">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MoneyBG_png" scale9Grid="28,8,175,51"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="36"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>
